entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regression: `Workload ID wasm-tools is not recognized.` #26967
  • `dotnet build` CLI issue with `-v:n -bl` in .NET 7 RC 1 builds #26965
  • Upgrade guide like angular #26950

Closed

  • 'dotnet run' command should fail with unknow arguments #23136
    8.0.1xx
  • Error meesage is unclear when trying to publish to an unsupported RID #26866
  • NativeAOT Symbol Stripping OSX with binutils #26953

PullRequests

Created

  • use $HOME in zsh tool path instead of ~ #26972
    Area-Linux
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26971
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Update SDK to account for the crypto worker file #26966
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix dotnet test --blame parameters to validate incoming values, and update help #26963
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Enable nullable for additional ApiCompatibility types #26956
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Add helper for safe access to CLI options when accessing outside of a command invocation #26948
    Area-CLI, cli-ux

Merged

  • Avoid parallel workload MSI extraction #26862
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.4xx

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1921748 #26946
    Area-Infrastructure
  • GenerateRuntimeConfig now uses stream serialization instead of loading file in memory #22576
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add rule for detecting attribute differences #26891
    Area-ApiCompat
  • [25961] - dotnet watch first key press fix #26870
    area-System.Console
  • Update ownership of dotnet watch #26669
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 7.0.1xx
  • Fix StatInterop to include new signature #26916
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate dotnet new Cli, dotnet-new3, *.IntegrationTests, *.UnitTests, template_feed to SDK #26521
    Area-Templates
  • test install-scripts #23812
    Area-Infrastructure
